author: rhuijben
msg: Integrate a group of helper functions that gathers different styles
of 'children' in wc_db.c. By just passing the statement id this
documents exactly what kind of children each function wants.
And it has the nice side effect of producing results in a stable
order for quite a few of these functions.
(add_children_to_hash): Remove function. Nobody wants a hash and
if we get results in order it is an expensive way to filter

author: rgodfrey
msg: QPID-6400 : [Java AMQP 1.0] add accessors for the SSLConnection to the connection factory

author: desruisseaux
msg: Better separation of matrix using WKT1 and EPSG parameters.
- The WKT1 case is implemented by MatrixParameters and still a general case, despite understanding the EPSG names (but only as alias).
- The EPSG case, which contains a little bit of "magic" that depends on the matrix size, is isolated in MatrixParametersEPSG.
